alert.note: Alert for Riverside County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 30 at 2:50AM PST until December 30 at 8:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM PST THIS EVENING ABOVE 6000 FEET... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Snow occurring. Plan on slippery road conditions. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches are expected. * WHERE...Riverside County Mountains above 6000 feet with the greater totals above 7500 feet. * WHEN...Until 8 PM today. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Be prepared for reduced visibilities at times. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Be prepared for snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. For road condition information in California...enter 8 0 0 4 2 7 7 6 2 3 if inside california or 9 1 6 4 5 5 7 6 2 3 if outside California.
